1.content: Which book would you prefer the secondary/tertiary characters be based upon?
1.title: Choosing Books

11.content: Now, choose a character from the following drop down menu that you would like to read about.
11.title: Beyond Giver

111.content: To determine the two different backgrounds of the Giver, I split the ideas by the Giver's name. Since the story is going to be about his past, he will not have the title of Giver and we need to identify him. So what name do you choose for the Giver?
111.title: The Giver's Name

12.content: Now, choose a character from the following drop down menu that you would like to read about.
12.title: Beyond Blue

info.brief_description: Utopian Worlds can seem idyllic, yet have an ugly underbelly of uncertainty and mystery.
info.description:
What is the background to the secondary and tertiary characters found in the quartet series by Lois Lowry?
Please feel free to add your input based upon the readings from this popular Young Adult series.
Expectations:
- No swearing or use of profanity
- No plagiarizing
- No inappropriate relationship dynamics between characters
- Please use a minimum of 400 words per chapter
- Please do not change the Author's Plot narrative found in each of the books . . . rather, add a "back story" to enhance our understanding of the character's inner traits.

Not adhering to these guidelines will result in the deletion of your chapter.
